description:
Community Arc Loader compatible release. Compatible with Call of Garrison Duty and any other mod that is supported by Community Arc Loader.

Battletech style quest events to add misfit pilots to your roster.

Two pilot questlines so far, however the second pilot is only available after 3052 ;)

As of version 0.4 Hotrod now has his own custom voice/dialogue.

He will not receive the new voice in existing saves, but there is a shortcut method to rehire him: Visit Lothario (west of Free Worlds League)

Required mods:
Community Arc Loader
author: Snafulator
